level.heading: Surrender of license and photo identification card and cessation of use of registration number.
level.text: ยง 22-219 Surrender of license and photo identification card and cessation of use of registration number. a. Suspension or revocation of a license or the discontinuance of business operations in the market area by a licensee shall require the immediate surrender to the market manager of the license and all photo identification cards issued for principals, employees and/or agents of the licensee. b. Suspension or revocation of a registration or the discontinuance of business operations in the market area by a registrant shall require the immediate cessation of use of a registration number and the immediate surrender of all decals, stickers and photo identification cards issued to such registrant and the principals, employees and/or agents of the registrant. c. A person who discontinues his or her employment in the market area shall immediately surrender his or her photo identification card to the market manager. d. Violation of the provisions of subdivisions b or c of this section where such license or registration is under suspension may result in revocation of the license or registration or criminal or civil penalties as provided in subdivision b of section 22-215 of this chapter, or both.
